typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as string,
		FL_DATE as string,
		OP_UNIQUE_CARRIER as string,
		OP_CARRIER_AIRLINE_ID as string,
		OP_CARRIER_FL_NUM as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		ORIGIN as string,
		ORIGIN_CITY_NAME as string,
		ORIGIN_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		DEST as string,
		DEST_CITY_NAME as string,
		DEST_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEP_DELAY as string,
		DEP_DELAY_NEW as string,
		ARR_TIME as string,
		ARR_DELAY_NEW as string,
		CARRIER_DELAY as string,
		WEATHER_DELAY as string,
		NAS_DELAY as string,
		SECURITY_DELAY as string,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
filterwetherdelay aggregate(groupBy(ORIGIN_CITY_NAME),
	avgWeatherDelay = avg(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY))) ~> AverageWeatherDelay
source1 filter(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY) > 0) ~> filterwetherdelay
AverageWeatherDelay sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TripDataCSV
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		surcharge as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		total_amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TripFareSQL
TripDataCSV, TripFareSQL join(TripDataCSV@medallion == TripFareSQL@medallion
	&& TripDataCSV@hack_license == TripFareSQL@hack_license
	&& TripDataCSV@vendor_id == TripFareSQL@vendor_id
	&& TripDataCSV@pickup_datetime == TripFareSQL@pickup_datetime,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinWithTripFare
InnerJoinWithTripFare aggregate(groupBy(payment_type),
	Average_Fare = avg(toInteger(total_amount)),
		total_trip_distance = sum(toInteger(trip_distance))) ~> AggByPaymentType
AggByPaymentType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLDWSink

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MovieData
MovieData filter(toInteger(year) >= 1990 && toInteger(year) <=2000) ~> FilterYear1990to2000
FilterYear1990to2000 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AvgRating = avg(toInteger(Rating)),
		AvgRottenRating = avg(toInteger({Rotton Tomato}))) ~> AggMovieRatig
AggMovieRatig sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AvgRatingByYear.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AvgMovieRatingsbyYear
